fields.value: - Shoot a bomb at a player, dealing to them a basic attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**MOAB Assassin**
*Unlock Condition*: Kill 2 players.
- Your attack will be upgraded to powerful.
- Upon killing at least one player with basic defense, your attack is upgraded to unstoppable.
- Upon killing at least one player with powerful defense, your attack is upgraded to overkill.
- Upon killing 4 people, you gain the "Moab Assassin" ability, permitting you to attack two people in a night.
**Recursive Cluster**
*Unlock Condition*: Kill 4 players.
- You will now attack the visitors of the target, and your attacks become astral.
- Upon killing one visitor, you will now attack the targets neighbors.
- Upon killing 8 people, you will now attack the targets neighbors neighbors as well.
- You skip over monkeys.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- You may only choose one upgrade, outlined in bold.
